name: Royal Poinciana
description: A striking tropical tree known for its vibrant red and orange flowers, the Royal Poinciana is perfect for adding a dramatic flair to any landscape.

careInformation.wateringRequirements: Water regularly during the growing season; reduce watering in winter.
careInformation.sunlightRequirements: Full sun (at least 6 hours of direct sunlight per day).
careInformation.fertilization: Fertilize monthly during the growing season with a balanced fertilizer.
careInformation.pruning: Prune in late winter to shape and remove any dead or weak branches.
careInformation.pestsAndDiseases: Generally pest-resistant, but can be susceptible to scale insects and caterpillars. Regularly inspect and treat as needed.

additionalInformation.seasonality: Blooms in late spring to early summer.
additionalInformation.hardiness: Sensitive to frost; requires protection in cooler climates.
additionalInformation.uses: Ideal for ornamental use, providing shade, and adding vibrant color to landscapes.
